def_cn: (团体、组织中的）中坚力量，骨干分子，核心分子
def_en: You can refer to the members of a group who are the most committed to its activities or who are the most involved in them as a hard core of members or as the hard-core members.

def_cn: （色情作品）赤裸裸的，暴力的，露骨的
def_en: Hard-core pornography shows sex in a very detailed way, or shows very violent or unpleasant sex.

def_cn: （现代音乐）极端的，硬核的，纯正的
def_en: Hard-core music is an extreme form of a particular type of modern music.
